'''1.12.3''' is the first and only beta version of [[Education Edition 1.12.5]], released on October 23, 2019.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''Library'''
*The [[Library (Minecraft Education)|Library]] menu has been updated based on user feedback to bring lesson content in-game, providing lesson plans and categories to simplify navigating the library of lessons, worlds, build challenges, and tutorials.</onlyinclude>
